TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewPaintParts extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines values for specifying the parts of a that are to be painted.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the protected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Paint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and by handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPrePaint>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
## Examples The following code example illustrates the use of this type. This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts All = int32(127)

Docs.summary: All parts of the cell should be painted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts Background = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The background of the cell should be painted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts Border = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The border of the cell should be painted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts ContentBackground = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The background of the cell content should be painted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts ContentForeground = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The foreground of the cell content should be painted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts ErrorIcon = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The cell error icon should be painted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts Focus = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The focus rectangle should be painted around the cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts SelectionBackground = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The background of the cell should be painted when the cell is selected.
